<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        var b = a + " (Now)";

        // setp3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Script Operation - u_link_type</name><operation_group/><order>700</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var input = batch[i].input; 
     var trfGR = new GlideRecord('trf_value');
     trfGR.addQuery('type', 'Type');
     trfGR.addQuery('name', input);
     trfGR.query();
     if(trfGR.next()){
        output[i] = trfGR.getUniqueValue();
     }
     else{
        trfGR.initialize();
        trfGR.type = 'Type';
        trfGR.name = input;
        trfGR.inventory_category = 'physical_connection';
        output[i] = trfGR.insert();
     }
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_link_type">3da8491c87600950c4a3c99d0ebb3598</source_sys_rte_eb_field><source_sys_rte_eb_fields/><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>aveenstra</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-08 16:15:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>59bf8be187ed8954c4a3c99d0ebb355d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Operation - u_link_type</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_exfo2_cmdb">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Physical Links">24b681d887600950c4a3c99d0ebb3502</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">15a881d887600950c4a3c99d0ebb353c</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation_59bf8be187ed8954c4a3c99d0ebb355d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-27 17:16:17</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_link_type_lookup">d5bf8be187ed8954c4a3c99d0ebb355b</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Script Operation">941f88e273b333002b6265a751ab9e84</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_script_operation></record_update>
